snippet: SCHECHTER--Marvin, of New York and Boca Raton, FL, passed away on March 17th after a brief illness. We will remember him as a wonderful father, grandfather, companion, friend, Friar and Veteran. He will be missed greatly by all. He is survived by his family Stephen, Jen and Liam, Scott, Wendy, Samantha, Sabrina and Harry; Christine, Stephanie and Amie. Graveside services will be at Mt. Ararat Cemetery, Lindenhurst, NY Sunday, March 20th, 11am. In lieu of of flowers, donations can be made to Chabad of Bedford, New York or Chabad of West Boca Raton. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHECHTER--Marvin, of New York and Boca Raton, FL, passed away on March 17th after a brief illness. We will remember him as a wonderful father, grandfather, companion, friend, Friar and Veteran. He will be missed greatly by all. He is survived by his family Stephen, Jen and Liam, Scott, Wendy, Samantha, Sabrina and Harry; Christine, Stephanie and Amie. Graveside services will be at Mt. Ararat Cemetery, Lindenhurst, NY Sunday, March 20th, 11am. In lieu of of flowers, donations can be made to Chabad of Bedford, New York or Chabad of West Boca Raton. 1/3
